value.title: Opinion: Facial Recognition Vital to Nab Capitol Assailants
value.excerpt: While cities ranging from San Francisco to Boston have worked to ban facial recognition outright, without that technology, the FBI and Capitol Police would have had a harder job arresting the Capitol insurrectionists.

value.title: New AI software can turn regular security cameras into COVID-19 policy enforcement points
value.excerpt: Now being trialed in Georgia smart city Peachtree Corners, the new tech can pick up on people standing too close together and detect whether someone is wearing a mask.

value.title: Kami’s new video doorbell boasts on-device person detection and facial recognition
value.excerpt: The Kami Doorbell Camera doesn’t need the cloud to detect people or recognize friends and family, although it does rely on cloud-based video storage.

value.title: Google launches suite of AI-powered solutions for retailers
value.excerpt: Google's new Product Discovery Solutions for Retail aims to address ecommerce challenges during the pandemic with AI and machine learning.

value.title: AI Plus IoT Are Among The Most Important Ingredients In Pandemic Vaccine Cold-Chain
value.excerpt: Startup Youtiligent has developed an AIoT-based technology to help companies keep vaccines cold across complex distribution supply chains.

value.title: Trovata.io raises $20 million to aggregate enterprise bank accounts with AI

value.title: OncoHost raises $8 million to develop AI that predicts cancer treatment responses
value.excerpt: OncoHost, a startup developing an AI platform to predict cancer treatment responses and identify drug targets, has raised $8 million.

value.title: Will AI Save The Movie Consumer?
value.excerpt: Any organization planning to use AI in their processes should collect a diverse and trusted set of data upon which to perform thorough back-testing to reach the necessary precision for their intended application.

value.title: K Health raises $132 million to launch AI-powered telemedical pediatric service
value.excerpt: K Health, a telemedical service using AI to diagnose and treat illnesses, has raised $132 million in venture capital.

value.title: Hybrid chip containing processors and memory runs AI on smart devices
value.excerpt: A group of researchers from Stanford have developed a way to combine processors and memory on multiple hybrid chips to allow AI to run on battery-powered devices such as smartphones and tablets.

value.title: YouTuber challenges scientist to create an AI version of him for $100
value.excerpt: That's the question YouTuber Tom Scott set out to find the answer to in his latest video, for which he challenged AI in neuroscience researcher Jordan Harrod to create a fake version of him for $100.

value.title: Delhi Airport evaluating 'computer vision' technology to track passengers: CEO
value.excerpt: Delhi Airport is evaluating computer vision technology to track passengers, reduce waiting time and ensure social distancing at terminals, a top official of the facility's operator informed | NewsByte
